title: KNOW - Manage and transform your frontline teams

creator: LocToc Pte Ltd
descriptionHtml:
KNOW is one single mobile platform that completely transforms frontline operations, training, and communications.
We know how hard it is to run your business, and equally how hard it is to work on the frontline – whatever industry you may be in. Our mission is to make your lives a lot better with the “superpower” of KNOW.

With KNOW you can:
+ Transform daily operational routines like checklists, tasks, and data collection
+ Plan, communicate, and manage work schedules/rosters and …
+ Track attendance with a mobile time clock and generate reports
+ Create the most gorgeous mobile-first training and assessments and know deep insights into every single user’s learning journey
+ Get instant visibility into faults, issues, and incidents on the ground and resolve them to closure
+ Conduct pulse polls and engage your employees to make sure they are happy
+ … and much, much more.

To get started, please contact your company and ask them to reach out to create an account with us. It literally just takes minutes.
descriptionShort: A single app to manage all your frontline operations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Enhancements to Learning and Communications Features
* Other minor bug fixes

We know how hard it is to run your business, and equally how hard it is to work on the frontline – whatever industry you may be in. Our mission is to make your lives a lot better with the “superpower” of KNOW.

With KNOW you can:
+ Transform daily operational routines like checklists, tasks, and data collection
+ Plan, communicate, and manage work schedules/rosters and …
+ Track attendance with a mobile time clock and generate reports
+ Create the most gorgeous mobile-first training and assessments and know deep insights into every single user’s learning journey
+ Get instant visibility into faults, issues, and incidents on the ground and resolve them to closure
+ Conduct pulse polls and engage your employees to make sure they are happy
+ … and much, much more.

To get started, please contact your company and ask them to reach out to create an account with us. It literally just takes minutes.
descriptionShort: A single app to manage all your frontline operations
